name: Mars to Mercia
description:
You're on Mars, readying yourself for the teleportation trip home, when aliens come to break stuff! Last until the teleport fires!

WASD - Movement

Mouse Pointer - Aim

LMB - Shoot

RMB - Throw Blocker grenade

Soundtrack from FreeMusicArchive: http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Winjer3/halt/Unstable

Made with bits and pieces from the following Kenney Assets:

  • Space Pack
  • Castle Pack
  • Racing Pack
  • Watercraft Pack
  • Fonts
  • UI Sfx
  • Rpg Sfx
  • Digital Sfx
  • UI
  • Space UI
